content.question: Which of the following is the interval of convergence for the series <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity, of, the fraction with numerator open parenthesis, x plus 4, close parenthesis, to the n power, and denominator n times 5 raised to the n plus 1 power, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover></mrow></mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo largeop="true">⋅</mo></mrow></mstyle><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open bracket, negative 9 comma 1, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>
<math alttext="open bracket, negative 5 comma 5, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>
<math alttext="open bracket, 1 comma 9, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, negative infinity comma infinity, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>∞</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open bracket, negative 9 comma 1, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

topic.text: 10.13: (BC ONLY) Radius and Interval of Convergence of Power Series

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
